A: Choose the best answer for each question.
1. You have 3 red apples and 2 green apples. How many apples do you have in total? (a) 4 (b) 5 (c) 6 (d) 7)
2. If you have 5 cookies and eat 1, how many cookies are left? (a) 3 (b) 4 (c) 5 (d) 6)
3. There are 2 birds on a tree. 3 more birds come. How many birds are on the tree now? (a) 4 (b) 5 (c) 6 (d) 7)
4. A cat has 4 legs. How many legs do 2 cats have? (a) 6 (b) 7 (c) 8 (d) 9)
5. You have 10 balloons. 5 balloons fly away. How many balloons are left? (a) 4 (b) 5 (c) 6 (d) 7)
7. If you have 8 pencils and give away 4, how many pencils do you have now? (a) 3 (b) 4 (c) 5 (d) 6)
8. To prevent damage, computer systems need adequate _ (a) space (b) dust (c) moisture (d) heat)
9. We should avoid _ near computers (a) ventilation (b) dust (c) space (d) fans)
10. Keeping computers cool helps them work better. True or False? (a) True (b) False)
11. A UPS helps prevent _ of information (a) gain (b) loss (c) speed (d) display)
12. Flash drives are a type of _ device (a) display (b) input (c) storage (d) processing)
13. Only _ users should access your computer (a) unauthorized (b) authorized (c) many (d) few)
14. An Anti-Virus program helps avoid computer _ (a) food (b) dust (c) viruses (d) water)
15. Unplugging the system when not in use for long helps _ it (a) damage (b) protect (c) heat (d) slow)
16. Adequate _ must be allowed between each system unit (a) dust (b) moisture (c) space (d) food)
17. We should avoid _ near computer systems (a) air (b) fans (c) food particles (d) cooling)
18. To prolong the life of a computer, we should _ it (a) damage (b) neglect (c) care for (d) ignore)
19. Protecting the system is a reason to _ for it (a) not care (b) care (c) break (d) hide)
20. A computer needs _ ventilation (a) no (b) little (c) adequate (d) bad)
21. We should avoid _ near computers to keep them safe (a) air (b) moisture (c) fans (d) space)
22. An air conditioner helps to _ the computer (a) heat (b) cool (c) wet (d) dust)
23. Electrical damages to the system can be avoided by using _ (a) dust (b) UPS (c) food (d) water)
24. Diskettes are a type of _ device (a) input (b) output (c) storage (d) processing)
25. File information on the computer needs maximum _ (a) sharing (b) deletion (c) security (d) exposure)
26. Viruses can be avoided by using an _ program (a) game (b) anti-virus (c) music (d) movie)
27. Leaving food particles near a computer is a _ practice (a) good (b) bad (c) safe (d) healthy)
28. Unplugging the system when not in use for a long time is a _ step (a) harmful (b) useless (c) protective (d) quick)
29. To make the user comfortable, we should _ for the computer (a) not care (b) care (c) ignore (d) break)
30. Avoiding dust helps to _ the computer (a) damage (b) protect (c) dirty (d) slow)
31. Moisture can _ a computer system (a) help (b) damage (c) clean (d) cool)
32. A fan is a type of _ machine for computers (a) heating (b) cooling (c) drying (d) cleaning)
33. Word processing software helps users produce _ (a) games (b) documents (c) music (d) videos)
34. Microsoft Word is an example of _ software (a) drawing (b) gaming (c) word processing (d) video editing)
35. Word Perfect is a _ word processing program (a) new (b) old (c) alternative (d) main)
36. A document created in Word Perfect can be opened by Microsoft Word. True or False? (a) True (b) False)
37. The _ bar shows the document name (a) menu (b) tool (c) title (d) status)
38. Icons on the tool bar represent _ used commands (a) rarely (b) never (c) frequently (d) seldom)
39. The (New) icon tool is used to create a _ document (a) old (b) new (c) saved (d) printed)
40. Positioning the mouse pointer on an icon tool may display a short _ (a) song (b) tip (c) picture (d) video)
41. The Menu bar activates _ of Microsoft Word (a) games (b) commands (c) pictures (d) sounds)
42. Clicking on an item in the Menu bar shows a _ menu (a) pop-up (b) drop-down (c) side (d) top)
43. "Files" is an item found on the _ bar (a) title (b) tool (c) menu (d) status)
44. "Bold" is a command found on the _ bar (a) title (b) tool (c) menu (d) status)
45. Microsoft Word was developed by the _ company (a) Apple (b) Google (c) Microsoft (d) IBM)
46. Word processing software helps in producing _ like reports and letters (a) food (b) documents (c) toys (d) cars)
47. Ami Pro is an example of _ software (a) spreadsheet (b) presentation (c) word processing (d) database)
48. The Title bar is found on all Microsoft/Window _ (a) games (b) applications (c) music (d) videos)
49. The "Save" icon tool is used to _ a document (a) delete (b) open (c) save (d) print)
50. The "Print" icon tool is used to _ a document (a) save (b) open (c) print (d) cut)
B: Fill in the blank with the correct word or phrase.
1. What is one thing to avoid near a computer system? _________
2. What type of program helps avoid computer viruses? _________
3. What is the name of a company that developed word processing software? _________
4. What bar shows the document name in a word processing program? _________
5. What type of device is a flash drive? _________
C: 1. List two steps to care for a computer system.
2. State two reasons for taking care of a computer.
3. Name two examples of word processing software.
4. What is the main purpose of word processing software?
5. Name two items found on the Menu bar in Microsoft Word.
answers_C: To avoid damage; To protect the system.
To assist the user in producing documents.
